note: Karla Davisio was born and raised in Boston, Massachusetts, and graduated from Brown University with a degree in economics. Karla became interested in personal finance at a very young age. She worked at an investment fund for a brief period of time in Chicago, Illinois, a personal finance and lifestyle website dedicated to helping its readers better manage their finances. The topics covered include saving more money, investing for retirement, starting an emergency fund.
